commandDescription: print a greeting and your org IDs
productsFlagDescription: comma separated list of product names, e.g.: 'GEPL,IPLC,VPN,Colocation Space'. Use '*ALL' keyword to take all products.
workflowsFlagDescription: comma separated list of workflow names, e.g.: 'GEPL,IPLC,VPN,Colocation Space'. Use '*ALL' keyword to take all workflows.
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
b2bFlagDescription: boolean determining if export/import B2B specific objects
dirFlagDescription: directory with product .jsons, please don't use special characters for folder names
relatedFlagDescription: boolean determining if export/import related products and charge references
currenciesFlagDescription: comma separated list of currencies ISO codes for which we want to export/import PricebookEntries
